content.body: i guess its not technically at stage 3 yet
nicolo-ribaudo implemented R&T in SiderMonkey during a Bloomberg internship, and that was continued by Igalia. Was behind a compile time flag. No JIT support afaik.
content.formatted_body: nicolo-ribaudo implemented R&T in SiderMonkey during a Bloomberg internship, and that was continued by Igalia. Was behind a compile time flag. No JIT support afaik.

content.body: Tim in Igalia proceeded to implement JIT support. It’s there in a patch in Bugzilla. But it is not expected to land in its current form.
* Tim in Igalia proceeded to implement parts of JIT support. It’s there in a patch in Bugzilla. But it is not expected to land in its current form.
